extension.description: Discover Huge Directory of Repos and Add-ons for Kodi 19 and above.

extension.summary: A quick way to install Add-on Repositories (Kodi 19 and up)
extension.description: Quickly and easily add third party sources to your File Manager, so you can install from zip file[CR]For Kodi 19 and above versions.[CR]None of the Repos are contained within this addon, it only serves to install URL's so you can download and install the developer's official repo zip file. [CR]This add-on is a fork of another add-on. The listing was updated and reformatted after some extensive searches for repositories and add-ons. Credit to the original creator for it's design and function. For info on add-ons in general, see https://www.reddit.com/r/Addons4Kodi/

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be.

TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.
Tubi TV has the largest library of FREE videos of hit and cult TV shows and films
extension.disclaimer: Feel free to use this script. For information visit the wiki.

extension.summary: Watch thousands of free videos and movies from the Internet Archive
extension.description: Internet Archive is a non-profit digital library. Choose from thousands of digital movies uploaded by Archive users which range from classic full-length films, to daily alternative news broadcasts, to cartoons and concerts. *Matrix Version*
extension.disclaimer: Support provided at forum.kodi.tv or via my github. I will not provide support at TVaddons, or any other forum. Please provide a full, unedited, debug log when requesting support.
extension.news: v4.2.6 - Fixes for search pagination and quality selection.

extension.summary: PowerNation TV is the source of how-to television for auto enthusiasts.
extension.description: PowerNation TV brings you in-depth how-to shows to cater to your automotive interests, featuring Xtreme Off-Road, Detroit Muscle, Truck Tech, Engine Power and more! Currently this add-on provides access to the free episodes only. *Matrix Version*
extension.disclaimer: For support go to my github. No support without a full, unedited debug log. No support at TVAddons or any other forum.
extension.news: Version 2022.03.04 - Fixed missing dependency in addon.xml file.

extension.description: Quest is a 24/7 broadcast television network that entertains and informs its viewers with exhilarating adventure programming about nature's greatest dangers, history's greatest mysteries and man's greatest achievements. *Matrix Version*
extension.disclaimer: For support go to my github. No support without a full, unedited debug log. No support at TVAddons or any other forum.

extension.description:
Watch cartoons and anime from [COLOR orange][B]www.wcofun.com[/B][/COLOR].
Support the WatchCartoonOnline website with a PayPal donation to: [COLOR khaki][B]wcohelp@yandex.com[/B][/COLOR]
Add-on originally by doko.
extension.disclaimer: The authors of this addon do not host any of the content found or have any affiliation with the content providers. This add-on only scrapes web pages.

extension.description: Hasta las narices de las apikeys de YouTube? Y de ver como calidad máxima los videos de la plataforma solo hasta 720p?[CR]Pues se acabó! Desde nuestra taberna os presentamos un nuevo addon de YouTube, donde no hace falta APIKEY alguna, ni tampoco hay ningún tipo de restricción para ver los videos a la máxima calidad ofrecida, 720p, 1080p, 2K y 4K![CR]Todo esto y mucho mas...

Tired of dealing with YouTube/Google api keys and only able to see the videos on the platform up to 720p?[CR]Well, that's over! From our team we present a new YouTube addon, where NO API KEY is needed, no logging in, nor are there any kind of restrictions to watch the videos at the highest quality offered (720p, 1080p, 2K and 4K!)[CR]All this and much more more...
extension.disclaimer: Este es un software [COLOR red][B]gratuito[/B][/COLOR][CR][COLOR red][B]Pero no se permite[/B][/COLOR] su distribuición preinstalada en ningún tipo de dispositivo ni tampoco su inclusión total o parcial en cualquier paquete de software y/o hardware por el que el usuario final deba [COLOR red][B]pagar o hacer una donación[/B][/COLOR], por su adquisición, por su uso o por recibir asistencia.[CR]Si cree que alguna de estas normas no se está cumpliendo póngase en contacto con nosotros.

This add-on is offered as [COLOR red][B]free[/B][/COLOR][CR][COLOR red][B]software! It is not allowed[/B][/COLOR] to be distributed or pre-installed on any type of device including in other software and/or hardware package for which the end user must [COLOR red][B]pay or make a donation[/B][/COLOR], for its acquisition, for its use or for receiving assistance.[CR]It must be redistributed for free. If you believe that any of these rules is not being followed, please contact us.
